active_incidents.title: Some users are appearing in a huddle after the huddle has ended

notes.body: We are still investigating the huddles issue that's causing the huddles status to remain as well as the inability to join new huddles.
Some users may be unable to initiate new huddles in addition to appearing on previous huddles after they have left. We're investigating this issue and we thank you for your continued patience.
Some users may appear to still be on a huddle once the huddle has ended. Weâ€™re investigating the issue and will be back with an update shortly. Thank you for your patience.

active_incidents.title: Some messages aren't loading from DMs and private channels

notes.body: Some messages from DMs and private channels aren't loading. We're currently investigating, and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We're sorry for the disruption.
